titleInfo.title: Mary Evans Payne with collie dog, 1939 May 18

mods.identifier: RG 412 252 Carr Payne dog photo May 18 1939 002

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Pictured: Mrs. Carr Payne (Mary Evans Tarpley Payne) with the familyâ€™s beautiful collie at their residence. Mr. Payne, a successful Nashville businessman bred collies as a hobby, was a primary founder of the Nashville Kennel Club. Their home residence, cited in the 1940 City Directory, was on Golf Club Lane. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission.
